job_info.title: Senior Research Scientist - AI Frontiers
job_info.description:
Join Microsoft Research to work on AI Frontiers and AGI research.
                Push the boundaries of artificial intelligence.
requirements: PhD in ML, AI, or related field
Proven track record of high-impact research
Publications in NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, ACL
Strong theoretical and empirical research skills

highlights: NeurIPS 2025 CureBench Global 2nd Place - AI Agent development
CureAgent framework, Executor-Analyst architecture, tool-augmented reasoning
Deployed Ollama, llama.cpp, vllm, TensorRT-LLM, mlc-llm
